/usr/bin/g++-6   -Wall -Wextra  -g   CMakeFiles/allegro.dir/src/main.cpp.o CMakeFiles/allegro.dir/src/ecs/Entity.cpp.o CMakeFiles/allegro.dir/src/ecs/Component.cpp.o CMakeFiles/allegro.dir/src/ecs/System.cpp.o CMakeFiles/allegro.dir/src/SMovement.cpp.o CMakeFiles/allegro.dir/src/CPosition.cpp.o CMakeFiles/allegro.dir/src/ecs/Engine.cpp.o CMakeFiles/allegro.dir/src/ecs/Timer.cpp.o  -o allegro -lallegro
